about_the_game:
Demo available until March 10th!
This is the DEMO page of Smokin Potions. For more information, please check out the full game page! In the demo, experience a taste of the full game with limited access to two battle maps, customization unlocks, and a selection of scroll effects and power-ups.

Chaos reigns as up to 4 friends battle in a magical, explosive local-multiplayer showdown. Create your wizard, choose your magical affinity, mix elements, and craft explosive potion bombs to dominate the arena. Even in defeat, haunt and sabotage rivals as a ghost, seizing a second chance at glory.

Take advantage of 2 unique stages, power-ups, and sudden-death hazards that change the flow of battle, keeping each match dynamic and full of surprises.

Customize your wizard with a limited variety of robes, hairstyles, and hats, and unlock new cosmetic items through the gacha mechanic to stand out in every battle.

DEMO FEATURE LIST

  • Arena Battles: Engage in local multiplayer matches for up to 4 players.

  • Magical Affinities: Experiment with Earth, Fire, Ice, and Arcane elements.

  • Element Mixing: Combine magical elements to craft devastating potions.

  • Scrolls of Chaos: Enhance your powers with buffs, summon hazards, or trigger game-changing arena events.

  • Ghost Comebacks: Sabotage rivals with their potions or through possession as a ghost and reclaim victory.

  • Customizable Wizards: Create unique wizards with partial access to hundreds of combinations of robe colors, hairstyles, and hats.

  • Gacha System: Win matches and collect stars to use in the gacha machine. Unlock a limited set of randomized cosmetic rewards.

  • Dynamic Stages: Battle on 2 different arenas with hazards and sudden-death mechanics.

  • Fast-Paced Fun: Quick, intense matches for casual and competitive players.

Explosive Competition

  • Compete with up to 4 friends in chaotic local-multiplayer battles, using potions as devastating bombs to create explosive mayhem.

  • Use ghost mechanics to sabotage and reclaim victory after elimination.

  • Survive sudden-death stage events to outlast your foes.

Potion Bomb Combat

  • Choose from four magical affinities: Earth, Fire, Ice, and Arcane.

  • Experiment by mixing magical elements to create powerful effects

  • Pick up items for buffs, stage-wide effects, or unpredictable twists.

Multiplayer Mayhem

  • Invite friends over for local matches or play via Remote Play Together.

  • Engage in fast-paced matches perfect for casual and competitive players alike.

  • Each player can create a personalized profile to track and expand their unique collection of cosmetics in the demo that will carry into the full game.

Customization

  • Design your wizard with robe colors, hairstyles, and quirky hats.

  • Earn stars by winning matches and spend them to unlock new cosmetics.

  • Try your luck with the gacha machine for a limited selection of randomized cosmetic rewards.
